summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northeast from south line of East 45th to south line of East 50th Street et al in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains under Ordinance No. 17255 creating Local Improvement District No. 1625 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
